title: Impacts of biochar and slag on carbon sequestration potential and sustainability assessment of MgO-stabilized marine soils: insights from MIP analysis
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00095A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chikezie Chimere Onyekwena, Qi Li, Yong Wang, Ishrat Hameed Alvi, Yunlu Hou, Chima Finnian Ukaomah, Theogene Hakuzweyezu
MgO-based binders enhance soil stability and CO2 sequestration. This study examines soft dredged marine soils treated with MgO, integrated with biochar or slag, demonstrating significant improvements in soil properties and environmental benefits.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
